title: ubuntu下1.7.10游戏闪退
author: 小定西西
txt_content:
最近尝试在ubuntu下运行MC1.7.10，前段时间服务器的问题搞定了，今天开游戏的时候遇到了问题，启动器刚加载完就闪退
本人ubuntu 14.04 64x系统     Forge版本：1.7.10-Forge10.13.0.1208     已经安装了lwjgl-2.9.1     启动器用的 HMCL  
mod有83个，windows下用BMCL启动没有冲突
终端代码提示如下：
*** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.0.5 ***
Restoring disabled mods: mods
Disable inactive mods: mods
Restoring disabled mods: coremods
Disable inactive mods: coremods
*** Invoking minecraft main() ***

2014-09-23 00:40:03,603 ERROR Error processing element Queue: CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2014-09-23 00:40:03,627 ERROR Unable to locate appender ServerGuiConsole for logger 
[00:40:03] [launcher/INFO]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[00:40:03] [launcher/ERROR]: Unable to launch
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
    at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:366) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:355) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:354) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:425) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:358) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:104) ~[launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:425) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:358) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:270) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:97) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
    at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraftlauncher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:152) [HMCL-2.0.5-Linux.sh:?]
*** Main class main() finished ***

小弟才疏学浅刚刚接触linux系统，对java研究也不深，希望诸位大神可以帮助一下小弟，感激不尽！

replies.txt_content:
小定西西 发表于 2014-9-23 08:10
不是，要联机玩的
ubuntu 这个东西我妹记错的话是开水桶服用的吧
